snippet: The European Union’s foreign policy chief expressed “great concern” on Friday over the fate of three Palestinians on a hunger strike in Israeli detention after the International Committee of the Red Cross warned they risked death.
abstract: Catherine Ashton, European Union foreign policy chief, expresses concern over fate of Palestinian detainees Samer Barq, Hassan Safadi and Ayman Sharawneh, who have been on a hunger strike for weeks in an Israeli jail.
lead_paragraph: The European Union’s foreign policy chief expressed “great concern” on Friday over the fate of three Palestinians on a hunger strike in Israeli detention after the International Committee of the Red Cross warned they risked death.
